steps.name: OME Forum 08/06/21 > Votre invitation à l’OME Forum le 8 juin

phase.name: Execution
phase.tooltip: This step is in Execution phase

top.label: Eligible
top.tooltip:
In case of a first step, this is the total number of eligible HCPs​
In case of a middle step, this is the total number of eligible HCPs coming from the previous step.​
Eligible = HCPs included in the target selection of the campaign

top.label: Reached
top.tooltip: This is the total number of HCPs who entered this step

top.label: CTOR
top.tooltip:
The click-to-open rate (CTOR) compares the number of unique clicks to unique opens. This gives you a better gauge of how the design and messaging resonated with your target, since these clicks are only from HCPs that actually viewed your email
CTOR = Email Opened / Clicked

cta.label: Click-through Rate
cta.tooltip:
Click-through rate (CTR) shows you the engagement of the email. Unlike CTOR, this measure indicates activity out of everyone who received the email in their inbox.​
CTR = Emails Clicked / (Sent – Bounced)

cta.label: I attend
cta.tooltip: This is the % of HCPs who clicked on this specific CTA

cta.label: I remotely attend
cta.tooltip: This is the % of HCPs who clicked on this specific CTA

cta.label: I do not attend
cta.tooltip: This is the % of HCPs who clicked on this specific CTA

cta.label: Unsubscribed
cta.tooltip: This is the % of HCPs who clicked on the unsubscribed URL​

other.label: Sent
other.tooltip: This is the % of emails sent whatever the HCP opened or not the email

other.label: Bounced Rate
other.tooltip: This is the % of emails that have been rejected by the HCP mailbox. A firewall, an invalid email address or a full mailbox can be  the root cause

other.label: Coverage Rate
other.tooltip: This is the % of HCPs from the initial target who have entered this step. Out off Targets are not included

other.label: Open Rate​
other.tooltip: This is the % of HCPs who opened the email out of the total number of email delivered

phase.name: Execution
phase.tooltip: This step is in Execution phase

top.label: Eligible
top.tooltip:
In case of a first step, this is the total number of eligible HCPs​
In case of a middle step, this is the total number of eligible HCPs coming from the previous step.​
Eligible = HCPs included in the target selection of the campaign

top.label: Reached
top.tooltip: This is the total number of HCPs who entered this step

top.label: CTR
top.tooltip:
Click-through rate (CTR) shows you the engagement of the SMS. Unlike CTOR, this measure indicates activity out of everyone who received the SMS
CTR = SMS Clicked / (Sent – Bounced)

other.label: Opt-In
other.tooltip: This is the total number of mobile Opt-In for this step

other.label: Delivered
other.tooltip: This is the % of SMS that are successfully delivered

other.label: Bounce Rate
other.tooltip: This is the % of SMS that are rejected. An invalid mobile phone number can be the root cause

phase.name: Execution
phase.tooltip: This step is in Execution phase

top.label: Eligible
top.tooltip:
In case of a first step, this is the total number of eligible HCPs​
In case of a middle step, this is the total number of eligible HCPs coming from the previous step.​
Eligible = HCPs included in the target selection of the campaign

top.label: Reached
top.tooltip: This is the total number of HCPs who entered this step

top.label: Response Rate
top.tooltip: This is the % of HCPs who submitted the form out of your total number of email delivered

cta.label: Open Rate​
cta.tooltip: This is the % of HCPs who opened the email out of the total number of email delivered

cta.label: Click Rate
cta.tooltip:
Click-through rate (CTR) shows you the engagement of the email. Unlike CTOR, this measure indicates activity out of everyone who received the email in their inbox.​
CTR = Emails Clicked / (Sent – Bounced)

cta.label: CSAT
cta.tooltip: CSAT score is the sum of respondents that answered somewhat or very satisfied. Obviously, the higher the number the higher the satisfaction will be.

cta.label: NPS
cta.tooltip: The Net Promoter Score = % of promoters (respondents that gave a  9-10) – % of detractors (respondents that gave a 0-6)

phase.name: Preparation
phase.tooltip: This step is in Preparation phase

top.label: Eligible
top.tooltip:
In case of a first step, this is the total number of eligible HCPs​
In case of a middle step, this is the total number of eligible HCPs coming from the previous step.​
Eligible = HCPs included in the target selection of the campaign

top.label: Reached
top.tooltip: This is the total number of HCPs who entered this step

top.label: Approval Remaining
top.tooltip: % of HCP who confirmed their attendance divided by the total number of HCP approved

other.label: F2F Approval
other.tooltip: This is the % of HCP who confirmed their attendance in F2F

other.label: Confirmed Online
other.tooltip: This is the % of HCP who confirmed their attendance within the Janssen Website

other.label: Cancelled
other.tooltip: This is the % of HCPs who cancelled their attendance

top.label: Eligible
top.tooltip:
In case of a first step, this is the total number of eligible HCPs​
In case of a middle step, this is the total number of eligible HCPs coming from the previous step.​
Eligible = HCPs included in the target selection of the campaign

top.label: Attended
top.tooltip: This is the total number of HCPs who attended the event

top.label: Conversion rate
top.tooltip: This is the total number of HCPs who attended the event divided by the potential number

other.label: Extra Attendees
other.tooltip: This is the total number of Attendees who have been added to the event after the end date

other.label: Cancelled
other.tooltip: This is the % of HCPs who cancelled their attendance
